item.title: You're in control
item.description: I believe one of the best tools to counter anxiety disorders is to finally understand that you’re ultimately in control. Your mind is not the pilot, you are. One of the best strategies that have helped me achieve my goal of controlling this Inner Demon is to assume control of the mind through voice and not the mind itself. The way this works is, instead of trying to rationalize yourself out of that state of panic using your anxiety poisoned mind, you use your voice to find rational paths through your thoughts.
